answers.answer: Praying for you and baby boy...
Prayers for u and ur baby boy!!
How far along are you? I'm supposed to be induced at 39 weeks for diabetes. I have a lil over a week to go.

question: I will get induced tomorrow at 5:30am, because gd (not my choice), i hear induction works best if you are already dilated, but i has been never check for dilatation, i asked my dr on my last appointment and she said i will be check tomorrow when i arrive and then we will go from there. Just please keep me and my little boy in your prayers.
title: Keep me on your prayers
